enhancedContent.overview:
Transform Notion into your complete sales command center with this streamlined CRM template designed for solopreneurs, freelancers, and small businesses. The Simple CRM delivers enterprise-level contact and deal management without the complexity or monthly subscription fees of traditional CRM platforms. Track unlimited contacts and accounts, manage your sales pipeline, and organize leads all within the Notion workspace you already use daily.

This template addresses the specific needs of small business owners who find tools like Salesforce overwhelming and expensive, but still need professional-grade relationship management. With dedicated views for incoming leads and active pipeline deals, you can focus on what matters most at each stage of your sales process. The intuitive structure makes it easy to see which prospects need attention, which deals are moving forward, and which clients require follow-up.

What makes this CRM particularly valuable is its simplicity combined with power. You don't need training to use it effectively‚Äîthe template's logical organization mirrors natural sales workflows. Track deal values to forecast revenue, categorize clients by status, and maintain detailed notes on every interaction. For consultants, coaches, agencies, and service providers who need to manage client relationships without enterprise software complexity, this template provides everything essential in a clean, accessible format.

faqs.question: How do I get started with this CRM template?
faqs.answer: After downloading, duplicate the template to your Notion workspace. Start by adding your existing contacts and accounts, then begin tracking new leads as they come in. The template includes pre-configured views for leads, pipeline, and clients, so you can immediately start organizing your sales activities without setup.

faqs.question: What's included in this template?
faqs.answer: The template includes a contacts database for unlimited people records, an accounts database for company management, a dedicated leads view for new opportunities, a pipeline view showing deals by stage, active/inactive client filters, and deal value tracking fields for revenue forecasting.

faqs.question: Can I customize this template?
faqs.answer: Absolutely. You can add custom properties like industry, company size, last contact date, or any fields specific to your business. The views and filters are fully customizable, and you can create additional views for specific segments like high-value accounts or prospects in particular regions.

faqs.question: What are the main use cases?
faqs.answer: Primary uses include managing freelance client relationships, tracking consulting proposals through the sales process, organizing agency leads and prospects, maintaining service business customer records, nurturing coaching or course enrollments, and replacing expensive CRM subscriptions for small businesses.
